projects.title: Tic-Tac-Overflow
projects.description: A command line game of Tic Tac Toe against an unbeatable AI (minimax algorithm). Built on C with an intentional bug, the game is intended as a tutorial for buffer overflow where the user can reach the win condition without playing against the AI.
